summary: filipe luis insists he wants to stay at chelsea until the end of his contract . the full back signed a three-year contract when he moved from the spanish champions last july . luis played in brazil 's friendly wins against france and chile .
aspect: 1. Filipe Luis wants to stay at Chelsea until his contract ends, despite Atletico Madrid's interest. 2. Luis struggled to secure left back position in Chelsea. 3. Chelsea manager Mourinho urges the team to remain focused on every match and win games.
explain: 1. Filipe Luis remains dedicated to Chelsea despite Atletico Madrid's interest.
